text.mine-lights.about.title: MineLights
text.mine-lights.about.support_intro: if u liek dis mod, plz consider supportin its development:
text.mine-lights.about.kofi: buy me a cheezburger on Ko-fi
text.mine-lights.about.description: MineLights iz a Minecraft Fabric mod dat bringz shiny RGB lightz to Minecraft Java Edition.
option.mine-lights.enableMod.tooltip: turnz all teh shiny lightz from dis mod on an off.
option.mine-lights.autoStartServer.toolt:
if enabld, teh mod will automaticly launch teh server
if its not runnin. teh server EXE must be in teh
'MineLights' folder inside ur .minecraft direcktory.
option.mine-lights.refresh_devices.label: REFRESH DEVICE LIST
option.mine-lights.refresh_devices.toolt:
if u plug in a new device while game is runnin,
check dis an save to make it appear in teh list.
option.mine-lights.restart.label: RESTART SERVER
option.mine-lights.restart.tooltip:
if teh server process haz a sad an stopz respondin,
check dis box an save to restart it.
option.mine-lights.restart_admin.label: RESTART SERVER AS BIG BOSS
option.mine-lights.restart_admin.tooltip:
use dis if stuff like Mystic Light iz not workin.
requirez admin powerz.
option.mine-lights.device.header: enabl or disabl specific shiny devicez below:
option.mine-lights.clear_disabled.label: RE-ENABL ALL DEVICEZ
option.mine-lights.clear_disabled.toolti: check dis box to clear teh list of all disabld devicez.
option.mine-lights.enableSaturationBar.t:
showz ur food saturashun on F9-F12.
switchz to ur air level when underwaterz.
option.mine-lights.enableLocatorBar.tool: showz direkshun of othr playrs or waypointz on 1-0.
option.mine-lights.alwaysShowCompass.too:
if enabld, teh compass effect will alwayz show teh standard compass
(pointin to world spawn), even if u dun hav one.
it will be overriden if u pik up any compass.
option.mine-lights.compassPriority.toolt: decidez which compass to display if multiple typez r in ur inventory.
option.mine-lights.highlightMovementKeys: highlightz WASD, Sprint, Sneak, an Jump keyz.
option.mine-lights.enableBiomeEffects.to: setz a base keyboard color based on teh biome u r in.
addz rain an thundersturm lightin effectz.
option.mine-lights.enableInWaterEffect.t: highlightz move keyz with a blu color when submerged.
option.mine-lights.force_update.label: Check 4 New Servr Stuff
option.mine-lights.force_update.tooltip: forces chk on guthib fur newezd servr file an downloads if it needz it.
minelights.status.downloading: STETUS: gettin ur bytez... %d/%d MEOWB (%d%%) ETA: %s SPEEDY: %s MEOWB/s kthx
minelights.status.verifying: Status: Makin shur filez r gud...
minelights.status.success: Status: Got filez an started! YAY!
minelights.status.failed: Status: Oh noes, it broked. Cuz: %s
